CustomProperties.Name: IconColorActive
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Either HEX or RGB or text value(red, blue etc). If using RGB, make sure you use this format - "rgb(1,2,3,1)" otherwise you'll get an error!

CustomProperties.Name: IconColour
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Either HEX or RGB or text value(red, blue etc). If using RGB, make sure you use this format - "rgb(1,2,3,1)" otherwise you'll get an error!
